mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_tb (user_id, order_date, shipping_name, shipping_phone, shipping_address_number, shipping_address_name, shipping_address_detail_name) VALUES (#{userId}, NOW(), #{shippingName}, #{shippingPhone}, #{shippingAddressNumber}, #{shippingAddressName}, #{shippingAddressDetailName})
INSERT INTO order_products_tb (order_id, product_id, size, count) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{size}, #{count})
mapper.update: UPDATE order_tb SET user_id = #{userId}, shipping_name = #{shippingName}, shipping_phone = #{shippingPhone}, shipping_address_number = #{shippingAddressNumber}, shipping_address_name = #{shippingAddressName}, shipping_address_detail_name = #{shippingAddressDetailName}, order_date = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
